Title: Zhezhi's Message
Text:
Hi Rover,

I'm not sure if this message will reach you, but I hope it does.

There's something I've been wanting to tell you, but I can't seem to find the right words in person... To be honest, I'm afraid you might reject what I'm about to ask.

I'd like to give you this scroll of painting. It's not just because you helped me with Mingyan's situation, but also because you freed me from a worry that's been haunting me for years. The Patrollers returned the "Serenity of Xiehua Village" that I drew during the hearing, but I want you to have it now. After all, it's the reason we met, a testament to our shared journey, and a symbol of the courage you instilled in me. In a way, we created this painting together.

My heart will always be connected to this piece, and I must admit, I have an ulterior motive... I want it to stay with you.

Zhezhi
